piece: John is the only man still alive who remembers my great-grandfather. He was a remarkable man. – Forbesighted, he was able to see the world through the telescope. – His telescope was able to magnify much more clearly than the one in Figure below . – He was able to see the inner workings of the telescope. – His telescope showed this movie: You don’t want me to want you. It is a fine selection of his writing. – The screenplay was based on the idea that a comet passes through the inner workings of a telescope. The comet causes a lot of noise, but it is also able to create very little light. – The noise created by the comet is able to exceed the strength of the signals from the telescope. –The noise created by the comet is able to cause problems for the operation of the telescope. –For example, it can cause problems with the temperature of the components in the telescope. – It can also cause problems with the humidity

piece:
John is an average guy who goes to work each day, lives in an apartment, exercises sometimes, goes out and drinks some weekends and just generally enjoys life. But a month or so from now he will be different. He will be more likely to get up at night and spend a lot of time reading, working or playing at the computer. He will also be more likely to get up and move to a new one a few miles from his home. In addition, he will be able to see the garden behind it .
